post.body: I know, retouching photos does take forever sometimes. Especially in group shots. Nice find!
Digg shirt! Cool!
If ur a Blackberry admin & you ever do USB activation for someone from your PC, MAKE SURE you aren't running Google Sync at the time. Aaugh!
I've got to be the laziest Secret Santa giver in the history of the tradition. Still, good gift, clever packaging and surely will be wanted.
Installed Wordpress 2.6 from GD, then decided to scrap & use 2.7. I have hardly a frame of reference but the console seems more advanced.
How embarassing... Prius owner runs his tank dry. Even gas sippers run out eventually no? http://snipurl.com/8oyaa
George W. - Matrix Style: http://is.gd/c8ky
They installed some new low energy florescents and they make colors look much more accurate.
Those gorgeous Colorado Rockies were socked in today. Oh well, they aren't that way too often.
My usefulness in this meeting is nil. So here I sit in the corner... Zzz... ://twitpic.com/t6lv
Weigh in and send the RSS to your blog so I can subscribe: Best, most versatile FREE blog software: Wordpress, etc.
I would love to be able to stay here and eat lunch but I have to go out in the cold bc I didn't bring any food with me. BRRRR!!!
Oh I just had a *great* time when they did that on my choppers @dailyintake Ugh! Well you'll be clean as a whistle when it's finally done
It's got to be >5 degrees colder in the main office than our wing. Probably helps that I'm running 4 4 PCs all by myself.
Looks luke you're getting your Goggles mixed up with your Googles @jbminn :)
Open tweet to Apple: please add the ability to let me put titles on my app pages or integrate the Customize app to help me organize my icons
Aww how cute, I just noticed my wife put up her teenie nativity set... http://snipurl.com/7z683
I know, they're dirt cheap now @zenrhe I also use "Portable Apps" so I can take my apps with me wherever. http://portableapps.com
LOL @luthdrix "This place is way cooler than the Sundowner..." niice! ;) where were you at in Niwot?
Urbanspoon now *is* in a city near you. They say the update has all US cities covered.
Bettie, you will be missed but your legend will live on forever.
Starting to squeeze the big deadline with the online merchants. May be relegated to the brick and mortar for the last items. :(
Damn it's sooo windy here! G'night all.
Dentist tomorrow to fix the smile hopefully. Ugh! Anyway, that was my night. Hope urs was better. LOL!
Thanks for all the love people. Warm&fuzzy. Here's me gettin' 13 stitches on my tongue and lip. http://twitpic.com/xv97 Not gory but JIC.
Oh joy. Trip to the ER. Not life threatening. Just damn inconvenient. Frack!
Yeah, just about @luthdrix It was 52-21 final. Ouch.
Thanks for keeping us informed @cityoflongmont ! Good to see our city is taking advantage of social networking technology by using Twitter.
Seems so wasteful that I'm getting a sim card for my son's phone from TN. I have extra sims but they won't activate them. Wuteva'
Go Chargers!!!
Yahoo! Party @ the Wardens. Good times! http://twitpic.com/x8bl
...because I dropped my deodorant in the sink, not because I am some kind of meticulous underarm groomer. Just putting that out there. Kthx.
For the record, if anything happens to me, a forensic report might show traces of shave cream under my arms. I assure you that it's only...
I'm pretty content with the pace, number of updates, replies etc between Twitter/Facebook. Keeping up just fine while erranding all day.
At Tippmann Pros. They have a good selection of HPA & Steelies! http://snipurl.com/961c7
I can deal with the cold. Bundle up, not a problem. But cold *and* wind, I detest cold, windy days. Ugh!
Went through pages and pages of Engadget headlines and found lots of interesting gadget articles. I am *so* out of the loop.
"Express how incredibly horrible our score is right now..." http://twitpic.com/wvq7
Where's a good place to rent snowshoes in this town?
Ragin' on Mario Kart... I am doing pretty good for only having played the demo at EB. Nice!
